data.title: Lionel Messi - Latest News and Updates on the professional Argentine footballer
data.meta_description: Get the latest news updates on Lionel Messi  - professional Argentine footballer - from Mail Online.
data.text:
Inside Lionel Messi's secret meetings and texts with Pep Guardiola to join Man City - starting with a five-word message... plus, why Pep turned down Cristiano Ronaldo

In our second exclusive extract from the new book on Pep Guardiola's Etihad reign, MARTI PERARNAU, the man closest to the best coach in the world, reveals how Lionel Messi flirted with his mentor.

Emotional Sergi Roberto says tearful farewell to Barcelona after 18 years at the club as Lionel Messi sends a message to his former team-mate

The 32-year-old midfielder joined Barca's youth ranks aged 14 back in 2006 and played 373 first-team games for the Catalan giants. But he left the club this summer following the expiration of his contract.

Lionel Messi shares snaps from luxurious summer vacation with his wife Antonela and their three kids

The couple were seen posing for snaps with their three sons, Thiago, Matteo and Ciro, while kicking back on a luxurious boat. He rocked a pair of black swimming trunks as he cuddled up to his family.

Inter Miami fans fume as Lionel Messi poses for picture with Republican Florida Governor Ron DeSantis: 'Keep football clean of politics'

Inter Miami fans are fuming after Lionel Messi was photographed with Republican Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis on Thursday.

Left-wing eco-mob trash Lionel Messi's £10million family villa and boast of spraying it with black and red paint while ranting 'the far-right blame this crisis on migrants'

Climate activists released footage showing two members of their group standing outside the front of the star's Ibiza villa holding a banner that read: 'Help the Planet - Eat the Rich - Abolish the Police.'

Lionel Messi's bodyguard reveals what Argentina star said about him to wife Antonela Roccuzzo after winning the Ballon d'Or

He has also given an insight into the relationship he has with the Inter Miami and Argentina star. Yassine Cheuko has shot to public prominence for how effectively he defends Messi at football stadiums.

Lionel Messi is hilariously side-eyed by wife Antonela Roccuzzo as he uses his phone during Inter Miami match

Lionel Messi was hilariously side-eyed by his wife Antonela Roccuzzo on Saturday night as he took in an Inter Miami match from the stands.

Lionel Messi is branded a 'diving c***' and 'arrogant' by a former Premier League coach

Lionel Messi has been branded a 'diving c***' and someone with 'the wrong arrogance' by a longtime Liverpool coach. The Reds erased a 3-0 deficit vs. Barcelona in the 2018-19 Champions League.

Trent Alexander-Arnold hails Lionel Messi as football's greatest and claims 'there's no way anyone can be better' than the Argentinian as he snubs Cristiano Ronaldo

Trent Alexander-Arnold tipped Lionel Messi as football's greatest-ever player as the Liverpool vice-captain chose the Argentinian superstar above Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo.

Lionel Messi and stunning wife Antonela relax with Luis Suarez and family on Miami boat trip after Copa America victory and ankle injury

Messi, who is set for an indefinite spell on the sidelines after damaging ankle ligaments in the Copa America final, was donning a protective boot as he continues to recover from the injury.

Lionel Messi has already given his verdict on potential Tottenham £33.5m swap deal involving Argentina team-mate

Messi, whose Argentina side won the Copa America , has already given his backing to his international colleague ahead of the potential move.

Injured Lionel Messi hobbles onto field in protective boot as Inter Miami celebrate captain's 45th major title after Copa America win with Argentina

Six days after Lionel Messi was subbed out of the Copa American final for an injured ankle, the Argentine legend hobbled onto the field in a protective boot at an Inter Miami game.

Lionel Messi's Copa America demand was ignored by Argentina teammates amid Enzo Fernandez racism row as captain's plea is revealed

Lionel Messi demanded his Argentina teammates conduct themselves properly after their 1-0 win over Colombia. However, his plea was ignored by the team.

Demba Ba describes Argentina as 'an asylum for former Nazis on the run' as the former Chelsea star wades into racism row after sports minister was fired for telling Lionel Messi to apologise

Enzo Fernandez is at the centre of a scandal after he posted a video on social media which appeared to show him and a number of his team-mates singing along to a 'racist' song.

Liverpool star Alexis Mac Allister insists Argentina 'isn't a racist country' and that Enzo Fernandez's chant video may have offended 'European sensitivity' - as Chelsea man's father compares song to taunts about Leo Messi's HEIGHT

Fernandez has received widespread condemnation for participating in the chant, including from his west London team-mates such as Wesley Fofana - who described it as 'uninhibited racism'.

Lionel Messi named the third-best athlete of the 21st century according to ESPN vote, just ONE British athlete makes the top 25... and how far down the list is Cristiano Ronaldo?

To a football-centred audience it almost seems sacrilege that Messi is not in the top two - but wait until you hear where Cristiano Ronaldo has been placed.

Lionel Messi 'told to apologize for racist chanting by his Argentina teammates', despite not even being with them when it happened

Even though Argentina captain Lionel Messi was not on the team's bus after its Copa America final triumph over Colombia, he is reportedly being asked to apologize for his teammates' racist chants.

Lamine Yamal gets Lionel Messi's old shirt No at Barcelona just days after inspiring Spain to Euro 2024 glory

Lamine Yamal will follow in the footsteps of Lionel Messi and wear the Argentine's old shirt number at Barcelona just days after inspiring Spain to victory against England in the Euro 2024 final.

Lionel Messi breaks his silence on grim ankle injury as Argentina teammates are greeted by wild scenes in Buenos Aires following Copa America victory

The 37-year-old was forced off the field midway through the second half of Argentina's 1-0 win over Colombia, when Lionel Scaloni's side secured a record 16th Copa America title.

Ballon d'Or contenders RANKED: The race to be crowned the world's best player is on after the conclusions of Euro 2024 and the Copa America

Euro 2024 and the Copa America both came to a close on Sunday night after a month of games, and the stars from the tournaments will now recharge ahead of the new season.

Lionel Messi wins a 45th trophy as Argentina lift the Copa America - but how does he compare to Cristiano Ronaldo in football's top 10 most decorated stars?

Lionel Messi continued to star as Argentina won the Copa America on Monday to give the superstar a 45th career trophy, but how does he compare to football's most successful players?

The TikTok star dating new Spanish wonderkid Lamine Yamal: Barcelona-based student Alex Padilla is revealed as the 17-year-old footballer's new love interest after pair went public with their romance at end of Euros final

Here is everything you need to know about Alex Padilla, the TikTok star who has seemingly captured the heart of Spain's Wonderkid.

Chaos as Copa fans are nearly crushed, hundreds sneak in through vents

JAKE FENNER IN MIAMI: The Copa America final between Colombia and Argentina descended into chaos on Sunday as throngs of supporters were nearly crushed outside Hard Rock Stadium.

Distraught Lionel Messi weeps after being subbed out of Argentina's Copa America final matchup with Colombia following noncontact leg injury

A distraught Lionel Messi was seen weeping on Argentina's bench after being subbed off in the 64th minute of Sunday's Copa America final against Colombia in Miami.

Copa America final descends into chaos as fans COLLAPSE in crush, hundreds sneak in through vents... and up to 7000 ticketless supporters are allowed in by shambolic organizers

JAKE FENNER IN MIAMI: The Copa America final between Colombia and Argentina descended into chaos on Sunday as throngs of supporters were nearly crushed outside Hard Rock Stadium.

Colombia coach Nestor Lorenzo blasts organizers' decision to hold Shakira halftime concert during Copa America final against Argentina

Colombia coach Nestor Lorenzo has slammed the extended halftime planned for Sunday night's Copa America final vs. Argentina to allow a concert by Shakira.

From a Messi bubble bath to Spain's sparkling superstar! Teenage sensation Lamine Yamal turns just 17 this weekend and has had an unforgettable journey... now, he will look to light up the Euro 2024 final

MATT BARLOW: You might have seen the most remarkable photograph of the week. It features a contented baby boy in a tub of soapy suds happy being bathed by his mother.

Lionel Messi's wife mocked for 'posting squat videos to strangers on the internet'

Roccuzzo, who married childhood sweetheart Messi back in 2017, recorded a clip of her 'squats and hip thrust day' in Miami and controversially chose to post it on Instagram.

The Drake curse: Rapper's infamous betting history in full after $300k loss on Canada's defeat to Lionel Messi and Argentina

The Canadian rapper has racked up a long list of massive losses in the gambling department over the years, leading to something known by many as 'the Drake curse'.

MLS team 'tried to sign Cristiano Ronaldo' after his explosive exit from Man United - as officials 'believe they were close' to beating Al-Nassr to his signature

Ronaldo left United by mutual consent after falling out with Erik ten Hag and a bombshell interview with Piers Morgan in which he lambasted the Dutchman.

Social media user compiles responses from more than 100 footballers to definitively answer who is better out of Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo - and the results are not even close

The 11 minute long compilation includes responses from ex-teammates of both Messi and Ronaldo and some of the greatest players and managers in the game.

England star set to be new EA FC cover figure as design is 'leaked' online with the youngster becoming the first Three Lions player since Wayne Rooney to feature

One of England's current crop of world class players has been tipped to be the cover star of the new EA Fc video game after designs of the new cover were reportedly leaked online.

Argentina troll Drake with reference to Kendrick Lamar's brutal diss track after rapper lost $300,000 bet on his native Canada to beat them

Drake earlier this week placed an extraordinary $300,00o (£234,195) wager on his nation to overcome Lionel Messi and Co in the Copa America semi-final.

Photos of Lionel Messi with Spain's Euro 2024 hero Lamine Yamal as a BABY resurface after historic tournament goal last night

The snaps of eight-time Ballon D'Or winner Messi - widely considered the greatest footballer of all time - show him smiling as he cradles Yamal who is wrapped in a towel.

Lionel Messi overtakes Ali Daei to become the second all-time top goalscorer in men's international football - but he still trails Cristiano Ronaldo by 21 GOALS!

Lionel Messi broke a tie with Iran's Ali Daei to become the second all-time top scorer in men's international football with a goal against Canada in the Copa America semifinals.

Argentina 2-0 Canada: Lionel Messi and Julian Alvarez lead World Cup winners into Copa America final

DANIEL MATTHEWS AT METLIFE STADIUM: Messi is now the second highest scorer in international soccer history - behind only Cristiano Ronaldo - after leading Argentina into the final.

Revealed: One England star TOPS the list of the top 15 penalty-takers in international football, but one of his team-mates just missed out making the top 10 - along with Kylian Mbappe!

The list was designed to take in not just players' accuracy, but their composure under pressure, as well as the importance of the penalties that are put away.

Drake places bold bet on Argentina's Copa America semifinal against his native Canada - and could win $3MILLION if it hits

Drake has backed his native Canada to shock Argentina in Tuesday's Copa America semifinal, with the rapper in line for a $3million payday if Jesse Marsch 's side spring an upset.

Argentina boss Lionel Scaloni makes bizarre claim that European teams should be invited to the Copa America to prove 'the level is very even'

Argentina manager Lionel Scaloni bizarrely claimed that European nations should be invited to the Copa America and vice versa to prove 'the level is very even' during a press conference on Tuesday.

Lionel Messi celebrates Argentina's Copa America shootout win on Instagram... but completely glosses over his own missed penalty

Lionel Messi celebrated Argentina advancing to the semifinals of Copa America Thursday on Instagram but left out one major detail, his own missed penalty in the decisive shootout.

Revealed: What Rodrigo De Paul said to Lionel Messi after his missed penalty for Argentina in Copa America quarter-final shootout

Messi stepped up first in the quarter-final penalty shootout with neither side able to make the breakthrough during extra time, but saw his penalty clip the crossbar and bounce over.

Cristiano Ronaldo has been accused of holding back Portugal's Euro 2024 campaign, while Lionel Messi is without a goal in Copa America but escapes similar criticism... so why are the all-time greats performing poorly?

The competition's all-time leading scorer, his nation's, perhaps even Europe's, greatest-ever player has not been shielded from the deluge of dissent.

'Messi don't care anymore': Fans react as Argentina captain MISSES an attempted Panenka in their Copa America quarter-final penalty shootout against Ecuador

Still without a goal in the tournament, Messi attempted to catch the Ecuadorian goalkeeper out by chipping his strike down the middle of the goal.

Neymar wastes no time in giving his answer on Lionel Messi vs Cristiano Ronaldo debate... but where did he rank himself against the superstar duo?

The Brazilian was taking part in a winner stays on style game shared on social media, where he had to choose between some of the best players of the modern era.

Emiliano Martinez pulls out THAT dance again after saving a penalty in Argentina's Copa America shootout win over Ecuador

Argentina goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez had a stellar performance between the posts as he led his side to a tight victory over Ecuador at the Copa America.

Sergio Aguero names the three players he thinks will step up and become Argentina's 'next leaders' after Lionel Messi retires

Sergio Aguero has named three players he thinks will carry the torch for Argentina whenever his great friend Lionel Messi retires from international football.

There will be NO extra-time during Copa America knockout rounds until the final... with tied games set to go straight to a penalty shootout

After a thrilling group stage, the quarter-final fixtures have been drawn for the competition and it's thrown up some intriguing battles that are set to take place.

Jan Oblak becomes just the second goalkeeper ever to save penalties from Cristiano Ronaldo AND Lionel Messi after denying the Portugal star at Euro 2024... but can you guess the first?

Jan Oblak is just the second goalkeeper in history to save penalties against Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi, after denying the Portugal star at Euro 2024.

Copa America quarter-finals CONFIRMED as Brazil fall short of top spot to set up showdown with Uruguay

Lionel Messi and Argentina will open the knockout stages against Ecuador in Houston on Thursday night, before Venezuela and Canada face off in Arlington 24 hours later.

Conor McGregor places another eye-watering bet on Argentina to win the Copa America after lumping £60k on Cristiano Ronaldo to win the Golden Boot at Euro 2024!

Conor Mcgregor has placed another eye-watering bet after previously placing a £60,000 wager on Cristiano Ronaldo to win the Golden Boot at Euro 2024.

IShowSpeed is stunned into silence by Cristiano Ronaldo's penalty miss against Slovakia... before having to endure fans taunting his tearful idol with Lionel Messi chants

Roberto Martinez's side were pushed all the way to a penalty shootout in Frankfurt after finding their opponent's defence impossible to breach.

Mexico dumped out of Copa America in the group stages after draw with Ecuador... as Venezuela thrash Jamaica to set up quarter-final showdown with Canada

Mexico manager Jaime Lozano is likely to face increased scrutiny after they scored just one goal in their three group matches to finish third, behind both Venezuela and Ecuador.

Argentina 2-0 Peru: Injured Lionel Messi watches from the bench as Lautaro Martinez's brace sees undefeated Albiceleste cruise to top of Copa America Group A

ISABEL BALDWIN AT HARD ROCK STADIUM, MIAMI: The Floridian air was thick with anticipation as Miami set the perfect stage for Argentina. The only problem? The star of the show didn't show.

Messi break-up! Furious woman raffles off her boyfriend's Copa America tickets and gives away his SIGNED Argentina shirt - after claiming he cheated on her with her best friend

A scorned woman has raffled her boyfriend's Copa America tickets after he allegedly cheated on her - and even gave away his prized shirt signed by Lionel Messi.

Lionel Messi's Argentina snatch late Copa America winner vs. Chile as Lautaro Martinez bundles in decisive goal for 1-0 win

With nothing left to prove in his glittering career, Lionel Messi actually achieved a first on Tuesday. The Argentine star stepped onto the MetLife Stadium field as a 37-year-old.

Neymar left baffled as Vinicius Jnr is subbed off during Brazil's dire 0-0 draw with Costa Rica in their opening Copa America match

Vinicius, after failing to make an impact, was replaced by Endrick in the 73rd minutes, a decision that left neymar confused as he watched from the stands at the SoFi Stadium.

Neymar leaves street vendor in shock after he stops to buy a Brazil shirt ahead of their Copa America clash with Costa Rica

Neymar has travelled to the United States to support his team-mates at Copa America and left one vendor starstruck after stopping by to buy a Brazil shirt.

David Beckham 'keen to lure Raphael Varane to Inter Miami after defender's Man United exit' as he looks to add to squad of superstars including Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez

Varane, 31, departed Old Trafford after his contract expired at the end of the season and remains a free agent as several clubs weigh up swooping for him.

DANNY MURPHY: How Luka Modric is unlike any other current Ballon d'Or winner... and why we'll miss the Croatian midfield maestro when he's gone

DANNY MURPHY: Only four current players have won the Ballon d'Or and three of them now play in the less arduous Saudi Arabian and North American leagues.

USWNT icon Carli Lloyd hits back at social media abusers after she compared Christian Pulisic to Lionel Messi live on FOX Sports

United States women's national team legend and Fox Soccer pundit Carli Lloyd has backtracked her bizarre comments comparing USMNT star Christian Pulisic to Lionel Messi.

Lionel Messi's stunning wife Antonela and their three kids pull on Argentina jerseys in the stands to support superstar dad in Copa America opener - after day out at Universal Orlando!

Antonela, Thiago, 11, Mateo, 8, and Ciro, 6, were in Atlanta, Georgia, to watch the 36-year-old Argentina captain provide an assist for the second goal of a 2-0 win against Canada on Thursday.

Could Lionel Messi copy Cristiano Ronaldo and play another tournament at 39? As Argentina dug deep to beat Canada at the Copa America, this was not the look of a man eyeing the end

JACK BEZANTS IN ATLANTA: For all the nights Messi has had where games have been carved out at his mercy, there were plenty of signs that this one was not going his way.

Why America's soccer stars should fear NOBODY at Copa America - even Lionel Messi - according to this former team legend

Donovan, who earned 157 international caps throughout his career, believes Gregg Berhalter's young side can take on anyone in their way of home triumph this summer - even Lionel Messi .

Lionel Messi leads Argentina to 2-0 win over Canada in Copa America opener - but defending champions must make BIG improvements

JACK BEZANTS IN ATLANTA: Lionel Messi lifted the curtain on the Copa America but took his time finding center stage before Argentina defeated Jesse Marsch's gritty Canada 2-0..

Copa America 2024: Lionel Messi misses TWO huge chances in Argentina opener as fans fear 'father time' has caught up with soccer great

Second-half goals from Julian Alvarez and Lautaro Martinez sealed an opening 2-0 victory for the holders in Atlanta, where they saw off a spirited Canada side to get their title defense off to a flyer.

Argentina 2-0 Canada - Copa America 2024 RECAP: Lautaro Martinez doubles champions' lead to wrap up opening win in Atlanta after Julian Alvarez broke the deadlock

Relive Mail Sport's live blog for Argentina vs Canada - including all the build-up, live scores and action from the opening Group stage of CONMEBOL Copa America 2024.

Lionel Messi's wife Antonela Roccuzzo enjoys a day out with the kids at Universal Orlando ahead of Argentina's Copa America opener

The wife of Inter Miami's captain dazzled in an all-red gym outfit at the theme park in Florida on Thursday. She took snaps with her two eldest sons, Thiago, 11, and Mateo, 8.

Lionel Messi-less Inter Miami beat Columbus Crew without Argentina star as he prepares for Copa America opener on Thursday

Ian Fray and Leo Campana each scored in the opening 22 minutes, and short-handed Inter Miami beat the Columbus Crew 2-1 on Wednesday night without Lionel Messi and Luis Suárez.

Forgotten wonderkid once dubbed the 'next Lionel Messi' aged just 13 is RELEASED by his club despite impressing on loan in England

The youngster was ruthlessly axed at the end of the season despite his contract being set to run until the summer of 2026.

Sergio Aguero insists Inter Miami would WIN the Premier League with Lionel Messi in their ranks

The ex-Manchester City striker revealed David Beckham's MLS team would upset the likes of the Top Four to be the best side in England with his former international teammate.

Cristiano Ronaldo branded 'classless' by fans after TAUNTING Czechia's goalkeeper and a midfielder... as Portugal score last-gasp winner to kickstart Euro 2024 campaign

The 39-year-old pumped his fist out towards goalkeeper Jindrich Stanek and shouted something in the ear of midfielder Petr Sevcik.

Vinicius vying for the Ballon d'Or, USMNT on home soil... and Messi's potential farewell! Five reasons why you can't miss Copa America as tournament prepares for liftoff

In just a few days' time Argentina and Chile will kick off one of the biggest soccer festivals of the summer when they collide at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia.

Manchester City legend Sergio Aguero reveals how he is set to make a return to football almost three years after announcing his retirement

The 36-year-old, who had to retire from football nearly three years ago because of a heart condition, is keeping the club's identity a secret but says it is not in his native Argentina.

What happened to Serbia prodigy - who Liverpool signed for £20m and top manager compared to Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo - as his country prepare to face England at Euro 2024 without him

With former Chelsea boss Avram Grant comparing him to Messi and Ronaldo, Liverpool won the race to sign the attacking midfielder, bringing him to Anfield for £20m in 2014.

No Messi, no problem! Inter Miami have to cope without absent star and have two men sent off... but STILL manage to score a last-minute winner to beat MLS rivals Philadelphia Union

David Beckham's team are enjoying a brilliant season after their struggles of last year, and perhaps the best moment of the season came without their World Cup winner on the field in Philadelphia.

Fans claim Lionel Messi is 'still the best player in the world' after his performance for Argentina vs Guatemala goes viral

Fans have insisted that Lionel Messi remains the greatest footballer on earth following a talismanic performance from the Argentina captain.
